thread.title: Lamar Odom found unconscious at brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom found unconscious at brothel

title: Lamar Odom found unconscious at brothel
text:
Lamar Odom Found Unconscious At Brothel, Taken To Hospital Kaileen Gaul , Katie Link 9:01 PM, Oct 13, 2015 
Photo Credit: Getty Images / Joe Robbins 
Former NBA player Lamar Odom has been hospitalized after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. 
TMZ reports Khloe Kardashian's ex-husband was found unconscious by a woman in his room at Dennis Hof's Love Ranch South. (Video via CBS ) 
Odom was put on his side after the staff called 911 and then reportedly started spitting up liquid. E! reports he has not woken up yet and the "prognosis does not look good." 
He was reportedly intubated at a local hospital then airlifted to one in Las Vegas. No information is available yet on what's caused Odom's condition. 
In 2013, Odom was in a video talking about taking drugs and cheating on Khloe Kardashian. That year he checked into a treatment facility for less than 24 hours. (Video via TMZ Sports ) 
The couple separated in December of 2013. They just signed the divorce papers this June. (Video via E! )
